metaData.title: Deewas
metaData.description: Personal Expenses Manager With Powerful AI Features And Simple User Interface

privacyPolicyPage.This privacy policy applies to the Deewa: This privacy policy applies to the Deewas app
privacyPolicyPage.for mobile devices that was created by A: for mobile devices that was created by Anh Khoa Nguyen
privacyPolicyPage.This service is intended for use: This service is intended for use
privacyPolicyPage.The Application collects information whe: The Application collects information when you download and use it
privacyPolicyPage.Information you provide during login, su: Information you provide during login, such as your email address, username, first and last name
privacyPolicyPage.Public profile information retrieved fro: Public profile information retrieved from third-party services (Google, Apple) if you choose to log in using these services
privacyPolicyPage.The time spent on the Application: The time spent on the Application
privacyPolicyPage.The operating system you use on your mob: The operating system you use on your mobile device
privacyPolicyPage.The Application does not gather precise: The Application does not gather precise information about the location of your mobile device
privacyPolicyPage.The Service Provider may use the informa: The Service Provider may use the information you provided to contact you from time to time to provide you with important information, required notices, and marketing promotions
privacyPolicyPage.For a better experience, while using the: For a better experience, while using the Application, the Service Provider may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to email, name, birthday
privacyPolicyPage.The information that the Service Provide: The information that the Service Provider requests will be retained by them and used as described in this privacy policy
privacyPolicyPage.Only aggregated, anonymized data is peri: Only aggregated, anonymized data is periodically transmitted to external services to aid the Service Provider in improving the Application and their service
privacyPolicyPage.The Service Provider may share your info: The Service Provider may share your information with third parties in the ways that are described in this privacy statement
privacyPolicyPage.Please note that the Application utilize: Please note that the Application utilizes third-party services that have their own Privacy Policy about handling data
privacyPolicyPage.Below are the links to the Privacy Polic: Below are the links to the Privacy Policy of the third-party service providers used by the Application
privacyPolicyPage.The Service Provider may disclose User P: The Service Provider may disclose User Provided and Automatically Collected Information
privacyPolicyPage.As required by law, such as to comply wi: As required by law, such as to comply with a subpoena, or similar legal process;
privacyPolicyPage.When they believe in good faith that dis: When they believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect their rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request;
privacyPolicyPage.With their trusted services providers wh: With their trusted services providers who work on their behalf, do not have an independent use of the information we disclose to them, and have agreed to adhere to the rules set forth in this privacy statement
privacyPolicyPage.You can stop all collection of informati: You can stop all collection of information by the Application easily by uninstalling it
privacyPolicyPage.You may use the standard uninstall proce: You may use the standard uninstall processes as may be available as part of your mobile device or via the mobile application marketplace or network
privacyPolicyPage.The Service Provider will retain User Pr: The Service Provider will retain User Provided data for as long as you use the Application and for a reasonable time thereafter
privacyPolicyPage.If you’d like them to delete User Provid: If you’d like them to delete User Provided Data that you have provided via the Application, please contact them at
privacyPolicyPage.and they will respond in a reasonable ti: and they will respond in a reasonable time
privacyPolicyPage.The Service Provider does not use the Ap: The Service Provider does not use the Application to knowingly solicit data from or market to children under the age of 13
privacyPolicyPage.The Application does not address anyone: The Application does not address anyone under the age of 13
privacyPolicyPage.The Service Provider does not knowingly: The Service Provider does not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13 years of age
privacyPolicyPage.In the case the Service Provider discove: In the case the Service Provider discovers that a child under 13 has provided personal information, the Service Provider will immediately delete this from their servers
privacyPolicyPage.If you are a parent or guardian and you: If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact the Service Provider
privacyPolicyPage.so that they will be able to take the ne: so that they will be able to take the necessary actions
privacyPolicyPage.The Service Provider is concerned about: The Service Provider is concerned about safeguarding the confidentiality of your information
privacyPolicyPage.The Service Provider provides physical,: The Service Provider provides physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards to protect information the Service Provider processes and maintains
privacyPolicyPage.This Privacy Policy may be updated from: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time for any reason
privacyPolicyPage.The Service Provider will notify you of: The Service Provider will notify you of any changes to the Privacy Policy by updating this page with the new Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.You are advised to consult this Privacy: You are advised to consult this Privacy Policy regularly for any changes, as continued use is deemed approval of all changes
privacyPolicyPage.By using the Application, you are consen: By using the Application, you are consenting to the processing of your information as set forth in this Privacy Policy now and as amended by us
privacyPolicyPage.If you have any questions regarding priv: If you have any questions regarding privacy while using the Application, or have questions about the practices, please contact the Service Provider via email at

termsAndConditionsPage.These terms and conditions apply to the: These terms and conditions apply to the Deewas app
termsAndConditionsPage.for mobile devices that was created by A: for mobile devices that was created by Anh Khoa Nguyen
termsAndConditionsPage.Upon downloading or utilizing the Applic: Upon downloading or utilizing the Application, you are automatically agreeing to the following terms
termsAndConditionsPage.It is strongly advised that you thorough: It is strongly advised that you thoroughly read and understand these terms prior to using the Application
termsAndConditionsPage.Unauthorized copying, modification of th: Unauthorized copying, modification of the Application, any part of the Application, or our trademarks is strictly prohibited
termsAndConditionsPage.Any attempts to extract the source code: Any attempts to extract the source code of the Application, translate the Application into other languages, or create derivative versions are not permitted
termsAndConditionsPage.All trademarks, copyrights, database rig: All trademarks, copyrights, database rights, and other intellectual property rights related to the Application remain the property of the Service Provider
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider is dedicated to ens: The Service Provider is dedicated to ensuring that the Application is as beneficial and efficient as possible
termsAndConditionsPage.As such, they reserve the right to modif: As such, they reserve the right to modify the Application or charge for their services at any time and for any reason
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider assures you that an: The Service Provider assures you that any charges for the Application or its services will be clearly communicated to you
termsAndConditionsPage.The Application stores and processes per: The Application stores and processes personal data that you have provided to the Service Provider in order to provide the Service
termsAndConditionsPage.It is your responsibility to maintain th: It is your responsibility to maintain the security of your phone and access to the Application
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider strongly advise aga: The Service Provider strongly advise against jailbreaking or rooting your phone, which involves removing software restrictions and limitations imposed by the official operating system of your device
termsAndConditionsPage.Such actions could expose your phone to: Such actions could expose your phone to malware, viruses, malicious programs, compromise your phone’s security features, and may result in the Application not functioning correctly or at all
termsAndConditionsPage.Please note that the Application utilize: Please note that the Application utilizes third-party services that have their own Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditionsPage.Below are the links to the Terms and Con: Below are the links to the Terms and Conditions of the third-party service providers used by the Application
termsAndConditionsPage.Please be aware that the Service Provide: Please be aware that the Service Provider does not assume responsibility for certain aspects
termsAndConditionsPage.Some functions of the Application requir: Some functions of the Application require an active internet connection, which can be Wi-Fi or provided by your mobile network provider
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider cannot be held resp: The Service Provider cannot be held responsible if the Application does not function at full capacity due to lack of access to Wi-Fi or if you have exhausted your data allowance
termsAndConditionsPage.In terms of the Service Provider’s respo: In terms of the Service Provider’s responsibility for your use of the application, it is important to note that while they strive to ensure that it is updated and accurate at all times, they do rely on third parties to provide information to them so that they can make it available to you
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider accepts no liabilit: The Service Provider accepts no liability for any loss, direct or indirect, that you experience as a result of relying entirely on this functionality of the application
termsAndConditionsPage.If you are using the application outside: If you are using the application outside of a Wi-Fi area, please be aware that your mobile network provider’s agreement terms still apply
termsAndConditionsPage.Consequently, you may incur charges from: Consequently, you may incur charges from your mobile provider for data usage during the connection to the application, or other third-party charges
termsAndConditionsPage.By using the application, you accept res: By using the application, you accept responsibility for any such charges, including roaming data charges if you use the application outside of your home territory (region or country) without disabling data roaming
termsAndConditionsPage.If you are not the bill payer for the de: If you are not the bill payer for the device on which you are using the application, they assume that you have obtained permission from the bill payer
termsAndConditionsPage.Similarly, the Service Provider cannot a: Similarly, the Service Provider cannot always assume responsibility for your usage of the application
termsAndConditionsPage.For instance, it is your responsibility: For instance, it is your responsibility to ensure that your device remains charged
termsAndConditionsPage.If your device runs out of battery and y: If your device runs out of battery and you are unable to access the Service, the Service Provider cannot be held responsible
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider may wish to update: The Service Provider may wish to update the application at some point
termsAndConditionsPage.The application is currently available a: The application is currently available as per the requirements for the operating system (and for any additional systems they decide to extend the availability of the application to) may change, and you will need to download the updates if you want to continue using the application
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider does not guarantee: The Service Provider does not guarantee that it will always update the application so that it is relevant to you and/or compatible with the particular operating system version installed on your device
termsAndConditionsPage.However, you agree to always accept upda: However, you agree to always accept updates to the application when offered to you
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider may also wish to ce: The Service Provider may also wish to cease providing the application and may terminate its use at any time without providing termination notice to you
termsAndConditionsPage.Unless they inform you otherwise, upon a: Unless they inform you otherwise, upon any termination, (a) the rights and licenses granted to you in these terms will end; (b) you must cease using the application, and (if necessary) delete it from your device
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider may periodically up: The Service Provider may periodically update their Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditionsPage.Therefore, you are advised to review thi: Therefore, you are advised to review this page regularly for any changes
termsAndConditionsPage.The Service Provider will notify you of: The Service Provider will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms and Conditions on this page
termsAndConditionsPage.If you have any questions or suggestions: If you have any questions or suggestions about the Terms and Conditions, please do not hesitate to contact the Service Provider via email at

aboutPage.Deewas is a modern, user-friendly app de: Deewas is a modern, user-friendly app designed to help you track and manage your personal finances effortlessly
aboutPage.Whether it's budgeting, tracking transac: Whether it's budgeting, tracking transactions, or managing wallets, Deewas has you covered
aboutPage.A clean and intuitive interface for easy: A clean and intuitive interface for easy navigation and management
aboutPage.Manage multiple wallets seamlessly to ke: Manage multiple wallets seamlessly to keep your finances organized
aboutPage.Visualize your spending with beautiful,: Visualize your spending with beautiful, interactive charts
aboutPage.Set budgets and stay on top of your fina: Set budgets and stay on top of your financial goals
aboutPage.Get help from our AI to manage transacti: Get help from our AI to manage transactions effortlessly
aboutPage.At Deewas, we aim to empower individuals: At Deewas, we aim to empower individuals to take control of their finances with intuitive tools and smart insights, making money management simple and stress-free
aboutPage.Join thousands of users who trust Deewas: Join thousands of users who trust Deewas to manage their expenses

helpAndSupportPage.We're here to assist you with Deewas!: We're here to assist you with Deewas!
helpAndSupportPage.Learn how to use Deewas with our detaile: Learn how to use Deewas with our detailed guide
helpAndSupportPage.Reach out to our team for personalized h: Reach out to our team for personalized help
helpAndSupportPage.Find answers to common questions below: Find answers to common questions below
helpAndSupportPage.How do I add a new transaction?: How do I add a new transaction?
helpAndSupportPage.Go to the Transactions page, click “Add: Go to the Transactions page, click “Add Transaction,” and fill in the details like name, amount, and category
helpAndSupportPage.Our AI can also help via chat!: Our AI can also help via chat!
helpAndSupportPage.Add them in the Wallets section and trac: Add them in the Wallets section and track separately
helpAndSupportPage.How do I set a budget?: How do I set a budget?
helpAndSupportPage.Navigate to Budgets, click “Create Budge: Navigate to Budgets, click “Create Budget,” and specify the category, total amount, and time range
helpAndSupportPage.What if I forget my password?: What if I forget my password?
helpAndSupportPage.Our support team is available 24/7 to as: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you
helpAndSupportPage.Drop us a message, and we'll get back to: Drop us a message, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible
helpAndSupportPage.Use the “Forgot Password” link on the si: Use the “Forgot Password” link on the sign-in screen to reset it via email

guidePage.Track your income and expenses effortles: Track your income and expenses effortlessly
guidePage.Navigate to the “Transactions“ screen fr: Navigate to the “Transactions“ screen from the navbar
guidePage.name (Coffee), amount ($5), date, wallet: name (Coffee), amount ($5), date, wallet, and category
guidePage.Tip Use the AI chat to say Add $5 coffee: Tip: Use the AI chat to say Add $5 coffee expense today for a quicker way!
guidePage.Find the transaction in the list: Find the transaction in the list
guidePage.Click the ✏️ icon next to it: Click the ✏️ icon next to it
guidePage.Organize your money across multiple wall: Organize your money across multiple wallets
guidePage.Enter a name (Cash) and choose an icon: Enter a name (Cash) and choose an icon
guidePage.Choose the destination wallet and amount: Choose the destination wallet and amount
guidePage.Click a wallet to see its transactions a: Click a wallet to see its transactions and balance
guidePage.Classify your transactions with custom c: Classify your transactions with custom categories
guidePage.Update the name or icon, then save: Update the name or icon, then save
guidePage.Confirm deletion (note only deletable ca: Confirm deletion (note: only deletable categories can be removed)
guidePage.Plan and control your spending with budg: Plan and control your spending with budgets
guidePage.Choose a category, set a total amount, a: Choose a category, set a total amount, and define start/end dates
guidePage.View the budget to see spent vs: View the budget to see spent vs
guidePage.Transactions in the category auto-update: Transactions in the category auto-update the budget
guidePage.Modify the total or dates, then save: Modify the total or dates, then save
guidePage.Learn how to master your finances with D: Learn how to master your finances with Deewas
guidePage.This guide will walk you through the cor: This guide will walk you through the core features of Deewas, from managing transactions to setting budgets
guidePage.Check out our support page or contact us: Check out our support page or contact us for further assistance
